oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-05-30 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 30, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers Boob Brasfield (Uncle Cyp), Tommy Jackson, Grandpa Jones, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1025th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Boob Brasfield; Wilburn Brothers; Tommy Jackson; Grandpa Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- That's The Way It's Gotta Be (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Boob Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Boob Brasfield, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- Somebody's Back In Town (Wilburn Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Tommy Jackson -- Fisher's Hornpipe (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Faron Young and Grant Turner talk -- When I've Learned (Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Grandpa Jones -- Are You From Dixie (Grandpa Jones)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
